verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> of Samuel לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> came to all Israel וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> went out יִשְׂרָאֵל֩ <S%H3478><s%> Now Israel לִקְרַ֨את <S%H7122><s%> to meet פְּלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines לַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside הָאֶ֣בֶן הָעֵ֔זֶר <S%H72><s%> beside Ebenezer וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines חָנ֥וּ <S%H2583><s%> pitched בַאֲפֵֽק׃ <S%H663><s%> in Aphek

וַיַּעַרְכ֨וּ <S%H6186><s%> put themselves in array פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7122><s%> to meet יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַתִּטֹּשׁ֙ <S%H5203><s%> and when they joined הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> battle וַיִּנָּ֥גֶף <S%H5062><s%> was smitten יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיַּכּ֤וּ <S%H5221><s%> and they slew בַמַּֽעֲרָכָה֙ <S%H4634><s%> of the army בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field כְּאַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> about four אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> were come הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> And when the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֒ <S%H4264><s%> into the camp וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> said זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why נְגָפָ֧נוּ <S%H5062><s%> smitten יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Wherefore hath the LORD הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> us to day לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> Philistine נִקְחָ֧ה <S%H3947><s%> accept אֵלֵ֣ינוּ <S%H413><s%> to מִשִּׁלֹ֗ה <S%H7887><s%> out of Shiloh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְיָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> unto us that when it cometh בְקִרְבֵּ֔נוּ <S%H7130><s%> among וְיֹשִׁעֵ֖נוּ <S%H3467><s%> us it may save מִכַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> us out of the hand אֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H341><s%> of our enemies

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> So the people שִׁלֹ֔ה <S%H7887><s%> to Shiloh וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> that they might bring מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲר֧וֹן <S%H727><s%> from thence the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelleth הַכְּרֻבִ֑ים <S%H3742><s%> [between] the cherubims וְשָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> there שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> and the two בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons עֵלִ֗י <S%H5941><s%> of Eli עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> [were] there with the ark בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God חָפְנִ֖י <S%H2652><s%> Hophni וּפִֽינְחָֽס׃ <S%H6372><s%> and Phinehas

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> came אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> And when the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> into the camp וַיָּרִ֥עוּ <S%H7321><s%> shouted כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> all Israel תְּרוּעָ֣ה <S%H8643><s%> shout גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> with a great וַתֵּהֹ֖ם <S%H1949><s%> rang again הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> so that the earth

וַיִּשְׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> And when the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the noise הַתְּרוּעָ֔ה <S%H8643><s%> of the shout וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> they said מֶ֠ה <S%H4100><s%> What ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> What [meaneth] the noise הַתְּרוּעָ֧ה <S%H8643><s%> shout הַגְּדוֹלָ֛ה <S%H1419><s%> of this great הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> in בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> in the camp הָעִבְרִ֑ים <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrews וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> understood כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> that the ark יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> was come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> into the camp

וַיִּֽרְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> were afraid הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> for they said בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> is come אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> into the camp וַיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And they said א֣וֹי <S%H188><s%> Woe לָ֔נוּ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nothing הָיְתָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> has happened כָּזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֶתְמ֥וֹל <S%H865><s%> before time שִׁלְשֹֽׁם׃ <S%H8032><s%> before that time

א֣וֹי <S%H188><s%> Woe לָ֔נוּ מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יַצִּילֵ֔נוּ <S%H5337><s%> unto us who shall deliver מִיַּ֛ד <S%H3027><s%> us out of the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> are the gods הָאַדִּירִ֖ים <S%H117><s%> of these mighty הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these אֵ֧לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> are the gods הַמַּכִּ֧ים <S%H5221><s%> that smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַכָּ֖ה <S%H4347><s%> with all the plagues בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness

הִֽתְחַזְּק֞וּ <S%H2388><s%> Be strong וִֽהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> and quit לַֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> and be men פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> O ye Philistines פֶּ֚ן <S%H6435><s%> or תַּעַבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> that ye be not servants לָעִבְרִ֔ים <S%H5680><s%> unto the Hebrews כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after עָבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> as they have been לָכֶ֑ם וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <S%H1961><s%> to you quit לַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> therefore be men וְנִלְחַמְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H3898><s%> and fight

וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <S%H3898><s%> fought פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines וַיִּנָּ֤גֶף <S%H5062><s%> was smitten יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel וַיָּנֻ֙סוּ֙ <S%H5127><s%> and they fled אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְאֹהָלָ֔יו <S%H168><s%> into his tent וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become הַמַּכָּ֖ה <S%H4347><s%> slaughter גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and there was a very וַיִּפֹּל֙ <S%H5307><s%> for there fell מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand רַגְלִֽי׃ <S%H7273><s%> footmen

וַאֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> And the ark אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God נִלְקָ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> was taken וּשְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> and the two בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons עֵלִי֙ <S%H5941><s%> of Eli מֵ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> were slain חָפְנִ֖י <S%H2652><s%> Hophni וּפִֽינְחָֽס׃ <S%H6372><s%> and Phinehas

וַיָּ֤רָץ <S%H7323><s%> And there ran אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> a man בִּנְיָמִן֙ <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin מֵהַמַּ֣עֲרָכָ֔ה <S%H4634><s%> out of the army וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> and came שִׁלֹ֖ה <S%H7887><s%> to Shiloh בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same וּמַדָּ֣יו <S%H4055><s%> with his clothes קְרֻעִ֔ים <S%H7167><s%> rent וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> and with earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head

וַיָּב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> And when he came וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold עֵ֠לִי <S%H5941><s%> lo Eli יֹשֵׁ֨ב <S%H3427><s%> sat עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַכִּסֵּ֜א <S%H3678><s%> upon a seat [יַךְ כ] (יַ֥ד <S%H5221><s%> beat ק) דֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> the road מְצַפֶּ֔ה <S%H6822><s%> watching כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לִבּוֹ֙ <S%H3820><s%> for his heart חָרֵ֔ד <S%H2730><s%> trembled עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> for אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> for the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְהָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And when the man בָּ֚א <S%H935><s%> came לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> and told בָּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city וַתִּזְעַ֖ק <S%H2199><s%> cried out כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> [it] all the city

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard עֵלִי֙ <S%H5941><s%> And when Eli אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the noise הַצְּעָקָ֔ה <S%H6818><s%> of the crying וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> he said מֶ֛ה <S%H4100><s%> What ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> What [meaneth] the noise הֶהָמ֖וֹן <S%H1995><s%> commotion הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> of this וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man מִהַ֔ר <S%H4116><s%> in hastily וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> came וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> and told לְעֵלִֽי׃ <S%H5941><s%> Eli

וְעֵלִ֕י <S%H5941><s%> Now Eli בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <S%H8673><s%> was ninety וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְעֵינָ֣יו <S%H5869><s%> and his eyes קָ֔מָה <S%H6965><s%> were dim וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכ֖וֹל <S%H3201><s%> that he could לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <S%H7200><s%> not see

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵלִ֗י <S%H5941><s%> unto Eli אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I הַבָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> I [am] he that came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמַּעֲרָכָ֔ה <S%H4634><s%> out of the army וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמַּעֲרָכָ֖ה <S%H4634><s%> out of the army נַ֣סְתִּי <S%H5127><s%> and I fled הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to day וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מֶֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> How הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> go הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> What is there done בְּנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted
